title: Add configurable Instagram link to header navigation

requirements.summary: Add a visible Instagram external link to the SiteHeader for both desktop navigation and the mobile menu, using the configured Instagram URL and opening in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: On desktop widths, the header displays an "Instagram" link in the primary navigation area.
On mobile widths, the mobile menu includes an "Instagram" link.
Clicking the Instagram link opens https://www.instagram.com/herwellness_2026/ in a new tab/window.
External link uses rel="noopener noreferrer" for security.
No existing header navigation items (Home, Personalized Wellness, Wellness Kits, Challenges, Free PDFs, About) are removed or broken.

file_operations.description: Import SITE_CONFIG and add an external "Instagram" <a> link (target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer") to both the desktop nav area and the mobile menu, ensuring it uses SITE_CONFIG.instagram.url (no hardcoded duplicate URL) and does not alter/remove existing nav items.

requirements.summary: Set the canonical Instagram URL in site configuration and ensure header/footer links use the shared SITE_CONFIG value.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer Instagram link continues to work and points to https://www.instagram.com/herwellness_2026/.
The header Instagram link uses the same SITE_CONFIG.instagram.url value (no hardcoded duplicate URL).

file_operations.description: Update SITE_CONFIG.instagram.url to exactly "https://www.instagram.com/herwellness_2026/" (canonical value used across the app).
Confirm the footer Instagram link continues to source its href from SITE_CONFIG.instagram.url so it automatically reflects the canonical URL after the configuration update.
